definition: in a vertical position, a piano with a vertical sounding board
details:
adjective
- in a vertical position
= synonyms: unsloped
- upright in position or posture
= synonyms: erect
- of moral excellence
= synonyms: just
noun
- a piano with a vertical sounding board
= synonyms: upright piano
- a vertical structural member as a post or stake
= example: a vertical structural member as a post or stake
= synonyms: vertical
